Dragon Companion.name: Dragon Companion
Dragon Companion.description:
You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonDrag]{Summon Dragon} without a Material component. You can also cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to cast it in this way when you finish a Long Rest.

Whenever you start casting the spell, you can modify it so that it doesn’t require Concentration. If you do so, the spell’s duration becomes 1 minute for that casting.

Foundry Note

This feature can be used for tracking your free usage. When you cast the spell you can uncheck the "Consumption" box and, optionally, the "Concentration" box.

Dragon Wings.name: Dragon Wings
Dragon Wings.description:
As a Bonus Action, you can cause draconic wings to appear on your back. The wings last for 1 hour or until you dismiss them (no action required). For the duration, you have a Fly Speed of 60 feet.

Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a Long Rest unless you spend 3 Sorcery Points (no action required) to restore your use of it.

Foundry Note

The Dragon Wings activity includes an Active Effect that grants you a Fly Speed of 60 feet.

The Restore Use activity can be used to expend the Sorcery Points to restore a use of the Dragon Wings activity.

Winged.name: Winged
Winged.description: he wings last for 1 hour or until you dismiss them (no action required). For the duration, you have a Fly Speed of 60 feet.

Dread Ambusher.name: Dread Ambusher
Dread Ambusher.description:
You have mastered the art of creating fearsome ambushes, granting you the following benefits.

Ambusher’s Leap. At the start of your first turn of each combat, your Speed increases by 10 feet until the end of that turn.

Dreadful Strike. When you attack a creature and hit it with a weapon, you can deal an extra 2d6 Psychic damage. You can use this benefit only once per turn, you can use it a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

Initiative Bonus. When you roll Initiative, you can add your Wisdom modifier to the roll.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which automatically adds your Wisdom modifier to your Initiative roll.

The Dreadful Strike activity includes the additional damage and tracks your limited number of uses. It's damage will automatically increase when you gain the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrStalkersFl]{Stalker's Flurry} feature.

The Ambusher's Leap activity includes an Active Effect that can be used to increase your Speed by 10 feet.

Dreadful Strike.name: Dreadful Strike
Dreadful Strike.condition: When you attack and hit a creature with a weapon

Ambusher's Leap.name: Ambusher's Leap
Ambusher's Leap.condition: At the start of your first turn of each combat

Dreadful Strikes.name: Dreadful Strikes
Dreadful Strikes.description:
You can augment your weapon strikes with mind-scarring magic drawn from the murky hollows of the Feywild. When you hit a creature with a weapon, you can deal an extra 1d4 Psychic damage to the target, which can take this extra damage only once per turn. The extra damage increases to 1d6 when you reach Ranger level 11.

Foundry Note

The Damage activity includes the extra damage. It automatically scales as you level up.

damage.condition: When you hit a creature with a weapon

Druid.name: 德鲁伊
Druid.description:
原初伟力的自然祭司

德鲁伊核心特质

关键属性

感知

生命骰

每德鲁伊等级 D8

豁免熟练项

智力与感知

技能熟练项

从奥秘、驯兽、洞察、医药、自然、察觉、宗教或生存中选择两项

武器熟练项

简易武器

工具熟练项

草药工具

护甲受训

轻甲和盾牌

选择 A 或 B：(A)皮甲、盾牌、镰刀、德鲁伊法器（长棍）、探索套组、草药工具，以及 9 GP；或(B)：50 GP

德鲁伊属于呼唤自然之力的古老教派。利用动物、植物和四大元素的魔力，德鲁伊们可以治愈疾病、变身动物，乃至驾驭元素施加毁灭。

德鲁伊崇敬自然至上，他们的魔法来自自然、自然神祇，或两者兼有。通常，德鲁伊会与其他德鲁伊一起进行仪式，以记录季节和自然周期的变化。

德鲁伊不仅会关注维持动植物生命的微妙生态平衡，还尤为注重人类与自然的和谐相处。德鲁伊常常守护神圣的地点或照看未受破坏的自然区域，但若世界出现重大危险时，德鲁伊会更加积极地作为冒险者参与其中，打击威胁。

成为德鲁伊 ...

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得“德鲁伊核心特质”表中的所有特质。
  • 获得“德鲁伊特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得“德鲁伊核心特质”表中的以下特质：生命骰以及轻甲和盾牌的训练。
  • 获得“德鲁伊特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。请参阅第 2 章中的兼职规则来确定你的可用法术位。

advancement.title: 原初誓约
advancement.hint: 您已投身于以下誓约之一，请自由选择。

advancement.title: 元素之怒
advancement.hint: 元素之力在你的身体里流淌。你获得以下一个你选择的特性。

advancement.title: 德鲁伊语
advancement.hint: 你学会德鲁伊语，一门德鲁伊之间的秘密语言。

Druidic.name: 德鲁伊语
Druidic.description:
你学会德鲁伊语，一门德鲁伊之间的秘密语言。在学会这门古老语言的同时，你也解锁了和动物交谈的魔法：你始终准备 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpeakwithA]法术。

你可以使用德鲁伊语来传递隐藏的信息。你和其他知晓这门语言的对象能够自动辨认出信息。其他人需要通过 [[/check inv 15]] 才能意识到信息的存在，但不借助魔法则无法解读

Foundry Note

德鲁伊语和“动物交谈术”在升级时会自动放入角色卡。

Elder Champion.name: Elder Champion
Elder Champion.description:
As a Bonus Action, you can imbue your Aura of Protection with primal power, granting the benefits below for 1 minute or until you end them (no action required). Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a Long Rest. You can also restore your use of it by expending a level 5 spell slot (no action required).

Diminish Defiance. Enemies in the aura have Disadvantage on saving throws against your spells and Channel Divinity options.

Regeneration. At the start of each of your turns, you regain 10 Hit Points.

Swift Spells. Whenever you cast a spell that has a casting time of an action, you can cast it using a Bonus Action instead.

Foundry Note

The Elder Champion activity will consume a use and includes an Active Effect which can be used for tracking creatures impacted by Diminished Defense.

The Regeneration activity includes the 10 Hit Points you can regain each turn.

The Restore Use activity will consume a 5th level spell slot and restore a use of this feature.

Eldritch Hex.name: Eldritch Hex
Eldritch Hex.description:
Your alien patron grants you a powerful curse. You always have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHex0000000]{Hex} spell prepared. When you cast Hex and choose an ability, the target also has Disadvantage on saving throws of the chosen ability for the duration of the spell.

Foundry Note

The spell is automatically added to your sheet when you level up.

Eldritch Invocations.name: Eldritch Invocations
Eldritch Invocations.description:
You have unearthed Eldritch Invocations, pieces of forbidden knowledge that imbue you with an abiding magical ability or other lessons. You gain one invocation of your choice, such as @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvPactTome00]{Pact of the Tome}. Invocations are described in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbWarlock000000.JournalEntryPage.FA4hxx49eazhISIt]{Eldritch Invocation Options} section.

Prerequisites. If an invocation has a prerequisite, you must meet it to learn that invocation. For example, if an invocation requires you to be a level 5+ Warlock, you can select the invocation once you reach Warlock level 5.

Replacing and Gaining Invocations. Whenever you gain a Warlock level, you can replace one of your invocations with another one for which you qualify. You can’t replace an invocation if it’s a prerequisite for another invocation that you have.

When you gain certain Warlock levels, you gain more invocations of your choice, as shown in the Invocations column of the Warlock Features table.

Current Max Eldritch Invocations: [[lookup @scale.warlock.invocations-known]]

You can’t pick the same invocation more than once unless its description says otherwise.

Foundry Note

You will be prompted for your choices as you level up. The advancement system does not prevent you from taking any invocations so be sure that you meet the requirements before selecting one.

Eldritch Knight.name: 奥法骑士
Eldritch Knight.description:
奥法遍身附剑戟

奥法骑士将所有战士共通的高超武技与对魔法的精妙研究融合贯通。法术补足并拓展了他们的武技，为甲胄提供额外的保护 ，并使他们能够使用爆发性的魔法同时与多个敌人鏖战。

Eldritch Master.name: Eldritch Master
Eldritch Master.description:
When you use your Magical Cunning feature, you regain all your expended Pact Magic spell slots.

Foundry Note

Use this feature to restore all expended Pact Magic spell slots. It will consume the free use from your Magical Cunning feature.

Eldritch Mind.name: 魔能意志
Eldritch Mind.description: You have Advantage on Constitution saving throws that you make to maintain Concentration.

Eldritch Smite.name: 魔能斩
Eldritch Smite.description:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvPactBlade0]{Pact of the Blade} Invocation

Once per turn when you hit a creature with your pact weapon, you can expend a Pact Magic spell slot to deal an extra 1d8 Force damage to the target, plus another 1d8 per level of the spell slot, and you can give the target the &Reference[Prone] condition if it is Huge or smaller.

Foundry Note

The Smite activity consumes a Pact Magic spell slot and increases the damage based on your pact spell level.

Smite.name: Smite
Smite.condition: Hit a creature with your pact weapon

Eldritch Spear.name: 魔能斩
Eldritch Spear.description:
Prerequisite: Level 2+ Warlock, a Warlock Cantrip That Deals Damage

Choose one of your known Warlock cantrips that deals damage and has a range of 10+ feet. When you cast that spell, its range increases by a number of feet equal to 30 times your Warlock level.

Repeatable. You can gain this invocation more than once. Each time you do so, choose a different eligible cantrip.

Foundry Note

Use the Increase Range enchantment activity and drag your chosen cantrip to the chat card to increase its range and append ", Eldritch Spear" for easier identification.

Eldritch Strike.name: 奥法打击
Eldritch Strike.description:
你习得用武器攻击削弱敌人对你法术抵抗能力的方法。当你用武器攻击命中一个生物后，直至你的下个回合结束前，该生物在下一次对抗你的法术所进行的豁免检定具有劣势。

Foundry Note

该关系包含一种主动效应，可用于跟进，但不会自动应用劣势。

Elemental Affinity.name: Elemental Affinity
Elemental Affinity.description:
Your draconic magic has an affinity with a damage type associated with dragons. Choose one of those types: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison.

You have Resistance to that damage type, and when you cast a spell that deals damage of that type, you can add your Charisma modifier to one damage roll of that spell.

Foundry Note

You will be prompted to choose the damage type as you level up. The additional damage is not automatically added but this feature includes an activity for each type of damage.

You can speed up use of this feature by moving your chosen damage type to the top and it will be used automatically when using this feature.

Acid.name: Acid
Acid.condition: When you cast a spell that deals damage of your elemental affinity

Cold.name: Cold
Cold.condition: When you cast a spell that deals damage of your elemental affinity

Fire.name: Fire
Fire.condition: When you cast a spell that deals damage of your elemental affinity

Lightning.name: Lightning
Lightning.condition: When you cast a spell that deals damage of your elemental affinity

Poison.name: Poison
Poison.condition: When you cast a spell that deals damage of your elemental affinity

Elemental Attunement.name: Elemental Attunement
Elemental Attunement.description:
At the start of your turn, you can expend 1 Focus Point to imbue yourself with elemental energy. The energy lasts for 10 minutes or until you have the Incapacitated condition. You gain the following benefits while this feature is active.

Reach. When you make an Unarmed Strike, your reach is 10 feet greater than normal, as elemental energy extends from you.

Elemental Strikes. Whenever you hit with your Unarmed Strike, you can cause it to deal your choice of Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage rather than its normal damage type. When you deal one of these types with it, you can also force the target to make a DC 8 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, you can move the target up to 10 feet toward or away from you, as elemental energy swirls around it.

Foundry Note

The Elemental Attunement activity expends 1 Focus Point and includes an Active Effect for tracking this feature.

The Elemental Strike activity can be used for your Unarmed Strike and will allow you to select the damage type in the roll dialog.

The Elemental Save activity includes the Strength saving throw.

Elemental Attunement.name: Elemental Attunement
Elemental Attunement.condition: At the start of your turn

Elemental Save.name: Elemental Save
Elemental Save.condition: When you deal Elemental Strike damage

Elemental Attunement.name: Elemental Attunement
Elemental Attunement.description: You gain the following benefits while this feature is active: Reach and Elemental Strikes.

Elemental Burst.name: Elemental Burst
Elemental Burst.description:
As a Magic action, you can expend 2 Focus Points to cause elemental energy to burst in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within 120 feet of yourself. Choose a damage type: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder.

Each creature in the Sphere must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes damage of the chosen type equal to three rolls of your Martial Arts die. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.

Foundry Note

The damage type can be selected in the roll dialog.

Elemental Epitome.name: Elemental Epitome
Elemental Epitome.description:
While your Elemental Attunement is active, you also gain the following benefits.

Damage Resistance. You gain Resistance to one of the following damage types of your choice: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder. At the start of each of your turns, you can change this choice.

Destructive Stride. When you use your Step of the Wind, your Speed increases by 20 feet until the end of the turn. For that duration, any creature of your choice takes damage equal to one roll of your Martial Arts die when you enter a space within 5 feet of it. The damage type is your choice of Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

Empowered Strikes. Once on each of your turns, you can deal extra damage to a target equal to one roll of your Martial Arts die when you hit it with an Unarmed Strike. The extra damage is the same type dealt by that strike.

Foundry Note

This Damage Resistance activity includes 5 Active Effects which you can toggle between to select your preferred Resistance.

The Destructive Stride activity includes an Active Effect which can increase your Movement Speed by 20 feet and allows you to choose the type of damage in the roll dialog.

The Empowered Strike activity allows you to choose the damage type in the roll dialog.

Destructive Stride.name: Destructive Stride
Destructive Stride.condition: When you use your Step of the Wind

Empowered Strike.name: Empowered Strike
Empowered Strike.condition: Once on each of your turns when you hit with an Unarmed Strike

Damage Resistance.name: Damage Resistance
Damage Resistance.condition: While your Elemental Attunement is active

Elemental Fury.name: 元素之怒
Elemental Fury.description:
元素的力量在你身上流淌。你选择获得以下其中一种效果：

强力施法。 你可以将你的感知调整值加到你德鲁伊戏法造成的伤害中。

原力蛮击。 一回合一次，当你以一次武器攻击或荒野变形后野兽形态的攻击命中一个生物时，你可以对目标额外造成 1d8 [[/damage 1d8 type=cold]]{寒冷}、[[/damage 1d8 type=fire]]{火焰}、[[/damage 1d8 type=lightning]]{光耀} 或 [[/damage 1d8 type=thunder]]{雷鸣} 伤害（由你命中时选择）。

Foundry Note

在升级过程中，系统会提示您进行选择。

Elemental Fury: Potent Spellcasting.name: 元素之怒：强力施法
Elemental Fury: Potent Spellcasting.description:
你将你的感知调整值加在你的以德鲁伊戏法造成的伤害上 (当前, [[lookup @abilities.wis.mod]])。

Foundry Note

该特性不会自动将感知属性调整值加到德鲁伊戏法上。

Elemental Fury: Primal Strike.name: 元素之怒：原力蛮击
Elemental Fury: Primal Strike.description:
一回合一次，当你以一次武器攻击或荒野变形后野兽形态的攻击命中一个生物时，你可以对目标额外造成 1d8 [[/damage 1d8 type=cold]]{寒冰}, [[/damage 1d8 type=fire]]{火焰}, [[/damage 1d8 type=lightning]]{闪电}, 或 [[/damage 1d8 type=thunder]]{雷鸣} 伤害（由你命中时选择）。

Foundry Note

在您获得 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdImprovedEl] 时，该特性所造成的伤害会自动提升。若使用该行动，您在掷骰时能够选择伤害类型。默认情况下，会采用您之前选定的伤害类型。

Elusive.name: Elusive
Elusive.description: You’re so evasive that attackers rarely gain the upper hand against you. No attack roll can have Advantage against you unless you have the Incapacitated condition.

Empowered Evocation.name: Empowered Evocation
Empowered Evocation.description:
Whenever you cast a Wizard spell from the Evocation school, you can add your Intelligence modifier to one damage roll of that spell.

Foundry Note

You can add your Intelligence modifier to the spell's Situational Bonus in the damage dialog or use this feature's Damage activity which allows you to select the type in the damage dialog.

damage.condition: Whenever you cast a Wizard spell from the Evocation school

Empowered Spell.name: 强效法术
Empowered Spell.description:
Cost: 1 Sorcery Point

When you roll damage for a spell, you can spend 1 Sorcery Point to reroll a number of the damage dice up to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one, currently [[lookup @abilities.cha.mod]]), and you must use the new rolls.

You can use Empowered Spell even if you’ve already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.

Empowered Spell.name: Empowered Spell
Empowered Spell.condition: When you roll damage for a spell

Empowered Strikes.name: Empowered Strikes
Empowered Strikes.description:
Whenever you deal damage with your Unarmed Strike, it can deal your choice of Force damage or its normal damage type.

Foundry Note

The Empowered Strike activity on this feature can allows you to choose between Force and Bludgeoning damage in the roll dialog. It will remember your choice going forward.

It uses your Martial Arts Die (currently [[lookup @scale.monk.die]] for damage and will automatically update as you level up.

Envenom Weapons.name: Envenom Weapons
Envenom Weapons.description:
When you use the [[/item Cunning Strike activity="Poison"]]{Poison} option of your Cunning Strike, the target also takes [[/damage 2d6 poison]] damage whenever it fails the saving throw. This damage ignores Resistance to Poison damage.

Foundry Note

The Poison activity on this feature includes the save and poison damage.

Alternatively, you can use the inline roll above if you've already used the original activity.

Important: This damage does not automatically bypass resistances so ensure the correct damage is being applied.

Poison.name: Poison
Poison.condition: When you deal Sneak Attack damage

Epic Boon.name: 传奇恩惠
Epic Boon.description: 你获得一项传奇恩惠专长 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.GxfrwkJbrIvn7reC]{传奇恩惠} 或其他一项你选择的适用的专长。推荐选择@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbBoonofIrresis] {无敌攻势之恩惠}。

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description:
When you're subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw and only half damage if you fail.

You don't benefit from this feature if you have the Incapacitated condition.

Evasive Footwork.name: Evasive Footwork
Evasive Footwork.description: As a Bonus Action, you can expend one Superiority Die and take the Disengage action. You also roll the die and add the number rolled to your AC until the start of your next turn.

Evocation Savant.name: Evocation Savant
Evocation Savant.description:
Choose two Wizard spells from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]{Evocation school} (change the Grouping mode to "School" for easier selection), each of which must be no higher than level 2, and add them to your spellbook for free.

In addition, whenever you gain access to a new level of spell slots in this class, you can add one Wizard spell from the Evocation school to your spellbook for free. The chosen spell must be of a level for which you have spell slots.

Evoker.name: Evoker
Evoker.description:
Create Explosive Elemental Effects

Your studies focus on magic that creates powerful elemental effects such as bitter cold, searing flame, rolling thunder, crackling lightning, and burning acid. Some Evokers find employment in military forces, serving as artillery to blast armies from afar. Others use their power to protect others, while some seek their own gain.

Exceptional Training.name: Exceptional Training
Exceptional Training.description:
When you take a Bonus Action to command your Primal Companion beast to take an action, you can also command it to take the &Reference[Dash], &Reference[Disengage], &Reference[Dodge], or &Reference[Help] action using its Bonus Action.

In addition, whenever it hits with an attack roll and deals damage, it can deal your choice of Force damage or its normal damage type.

Foundry Note

The Primal Companion's damage roll dialog's will allow you to choose the type of damage. It defaults to your previous choice each time going forward.

Expert Divination.name: Expert Divination
Expert Divination.description:
Casting Divination spells comes so easily to you that it expends only a fraction of your spellcasting efforts. When you cast a Divination spell using a level 2+ spell slot, you regain one expended spell slot. The slot you regain must be of a level lower than the slot you expended and can’t be higher than level 5.

Foundry Note

You can manually regain the expended spell slot or use the Regain Spell Slot activity which will prompt you for the slot to restore.

Expertise.name: 专精
Expertise.description:
你获得两项由你选择的你已熟练的技能的 &Reference[Expertise]推荐选择表演和游说，如果你具有这两项技能的熟练。

当你的吟游诗人等级为 9 级时，你额外再获得两项由你选择的你已熟练的技能的专精。

Extended Spell.name: 延效法术
Extended Spell.description:
Cost: 1 Sorcery Point

When you cast a spell that has a duration of 1 minute or longer, you can spend 1 Sorcery Point to double its duration to a maximum duration of 24 hours.

If the affected spell requires Concentration, you have Advantage on any saving throw you make to maintain that Concentration.

Extended Spell.name: Extended Spell
Extended Spell.condition: When you cast a spell that has a duration of 1 minute or longer

Extra Attack.name: 额外攻击
Extra Attack.description: 当你在自己的回合执行攻击动作时，你可以发动两次攻击而非一次。

Faithful Steed.name: Faithful Steed
Faithful Steed.description:
You can call on the aid of an otherworldly steed. You always have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFindSteed0]{Find Steed} spell prepared.

You can also cast the spell once without expending a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

The Find Steed spell is added to your spell list as always prepared and with a free use per Long Rest when you reach this level.

Fanatical Focus.name: 专心炽志
Fanatical Focus.description: 每个狂暴期间仅一次，若你失败于某次豁免检定，你可以重骰这次检定并在检定中获得等于你狂暴伤害的加值 （当前 [[/r @scale.barbarian.rage-damage]]），你必须使用重骰后的结果。

Fast Hands.name: Fast Hands
Fast Hands.description:
As a Bonus Action, you can do one of the following.

Sleight of Hand. Make a Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check to pick a lock or disarm a trap with Thieves’ Tools or to pick a pocket.

Use an Object. Take the Utilize action, or take the Magic action to use a magic item that requires that action.

Foundry Note

The Sleight of Hand and Thieves' Tools activities include the relevant checks.

The Use an Object activity can be used for tracking Bonus Action use.

Fast Movement.name: 快速移动
Fast Movement.description:
当你未着装重甲时，你的速度增加 10 尺

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个被动效应，会自动提升你的移动速度。如果你穿着重甲，请禁用快速移动被动效果。

Favored Enemy.name: Favored Enemy
Favored Enemy.description:
You always have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHuntersMar]{Hunter’s Mark} spell prepared. You can cast it twice without expending a spell slot, and you regain all expended uses of this ability when you finish a Long Rest.

The number of times you can cast the spell without a spell slot increases when you reach certain Ranger levels, as shown in the Favored Enemy column of the Ranger Features table.

Foundry Note

The spell is granted to you at this level and will increase the number of free uses available automatically as you level up.

Feinting Attack.name: Feinting Attack
Feinting Attack.description:
As a Bonus Action, you can expend one Superiority Die to feint, choosing one creature within 5 feet of yourself as your target. You have Advantage on your next attack roll against that target this turn. If that attack hits, add the Superiority Die to the attack's damage roll.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect for tracking the target but it does not automate the Advantage.

The Damage activity allows you to select the type of damage it should deal in the roll dialog.

Feral Instinct.name: 野性直觉
Feral Instinct.description: 你的直觉变得格外敏锐。你的先攻检定具有优势。

Feral Senses.name: Feral Senses
Feral Senses.description:
Your connection to the forces of nature grants you Blindsight with a range of 30 feet.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which upgrades your Blindsight to 30 feet if you do not already have it.

Fey Reinforcements.name: Fey Reinforcements
Fey Reinforcements.description:
You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonFey0]{Summon Fey} without a Material component. You can also cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to cast it in this way when you finish a Long Rest.

Whenever you start casting the spell, you can modify it so that it doesn’t require Concentration. If you do so, the spell’s duration becomes 1 minute for that casting.

Foundry Note

This feature can be used for tracking the free use. Then cast the spell and uncheck the "Consumption" box and optionally the "Concentration" option.

Fey Wanderer.name: Fey Wanderer
Fey Wanderer.description:
Wield Fey Mirth and Fury

A fey mystique surrounds you, thanks to the boon of an archfey or a location in the Feywild that transformed you. However you gained fey magic, you are now a Fey Wanderer. Your joyful laughter brightens the hearts of the downtrodden, and your martial prowess strikes terror in your foes, for great is the mirth of the fey and dreadful is their fury.

Fey Wanderer Spells.name: Fey Wanderer Spells
Fey Wanderer Spells.description:
When you reach a Ranger level specified in the Fey Wanderer Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Fiend Patron.name: Fiend Patron
Fiend Patron.description:
Make a Deal with the Lower Planes

Your pact draws on the Lower Planes, the realms of perdition. You might forge a bargain with a demon lord such as Demogorgon or Orcus; an archdevil such as Asmodeus; or a pit fiend, balor, yugoloth, or night hag that is especially mighty. That patron’s aims are evil—the corruption or destruction of all things, ultimately including you—and your path is defined by the extent to which you strive against those aims.

advancement.title: Fiend Spells
advancement.hint: The magic of your patron ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Warlock level specified in the Fiend Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Fiendish Resilience.name: Fiendish Resilience
Fiendish Resilience.description:
Choose one damage type, other than Force, whenever you finish a Short or Long Rest. You have Resistance to that damage type until you choose a different one with this feature.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect for each type of damage which will grant you the correct Resistance. Apply and disable the effects as necessary when you change types.

Fiendish Vigor.name: 邪魔活力
Fiendish Vigor.description:
Prerequisite: Level 2+ Warlock

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFalseLife0]{False Life} on yourself without expending a spell slot. When you cast the spell with this feature, you don’t roll the die for the Temporary Hit Points; you automatically get the highest number on the die.

Foundry Note

The False Life activity includes the maximum amount of healing.

Fighter.name: 战士
Fighter.description:
百兵之君，万甲之王 A Master of All Arms and Armor

战士核心特质

关键属性

力量或敏捷

生命骰

每战士等级 D10

豁免熟练

力量与体质

技能熟练

从体操、驯兽、运动、历史、洞悉、威吓、游说、察觉或求生中选择两项

武器熟练

简易武器和军用武器

护甲受训

轻甲、中甲、重甲和盾牌

起始装备

选择 A 、 B 或 C： (A) 链甲、巨剑、连枷、8 支标枪、探索套组和 4 金币 ；(B) 镶钉皮甲、弯刀、短剑、长弓、20 支箭、箭袋、探索套组和 11 GP ；(C) 155 GP

战士往往驰骋于战场。战士可以是探险骑士，皇家斗士，精英士兵或是老练佣兵，他们熟习各种武器与护甲，他们的生活与死亡相伴，既不害怕手上染满鲜血，也不畏惧迎接死亡。
战士精通各种武器技艺，装备精良的战士总能在任何战斗中找到合适的武器。同样，战士对于各种盔甲也驾轻就熟。除掌握基本使用技巧外，每位战士还专精于某种特定的战斗风格。有些专攻箭术，有些专精双持武器战斗，有些则擅长于用魔法增强自己的战斗能力。泛用与专精相结合，让战士在各处都能有卓越的表现。

成为战士……

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得“战士核心特质”表中的所有特质。
  • 获得“战士特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得“战士核心特质”表中的以下特质：生命骰，军用武器熟练项，以及轻甲和盾牌的训练。
  • 获得“战士特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。

Fighting Style.name: 战斗风格
Fighting Style.description:
你不断磨练你的武艺。你获得一项你选择的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.sbHImaCB8ZMEHYkb]。推荐选择@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbfstDefense000]。

每当你获得战士等级时，你可以将其改为另一个战斗风格专长。

Fleet Step.name: Fleet Step
Fleet Step.description: When you take a Bonus Action other than Step of the Wind, you can also use Step of the Wind immediately after that Bonus Action.

Flurry of Healing and Harm.name: Flurry of Healing and Harm
Flurry of Healing and Harm.description:
When you use Flurry of Blows, you can replace each of the Unarmed Strikes with a use of Hand of Healing without expending Focus Points for the healing.

In addition, when you make an Unarmed Strike with Flurry of Blows and deal damage, you can use Hand of Harm with that strike without expending a Focus Point for Hand of Harm. You can still use Hand of Harm only once per turn.

You can use these benefits a total number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once). You regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

This feature can be used for tracking your available uses.

Foe Slayer.name: Foe Slayer
Foe Slayer.description:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHuntersMar]{Hunter’s Mark} is a d10 rather than a d6.

Foundry Note

You may use this feature in place of the Bonus Mark Damage activity on the Hunter's Mark spell.

Font of Inspiration.name: 激励之源
Font of Inspiration.description:
现在你可以在完成短休或长休后恢复你已消耗的诗人激励次数。

此外，你可以消耗一个法术位（无需行动）来恢复一次已消耗的吟游诗人激励。

Foundry Note

你必须在角色卡中更新吟游诗人激励特性，使其在短休时恢复，因为默认情况下是长休时恢复。

以法术位充能行动会耗费一个法术位，并赋予一次吟游诗人灵感的使用次数。

Font of Magic.name: Font of Magic
Font of Magic.description:
You can tap into the wellspring of magic within yourself. This wellspring is represented by Sorcery Points, which allow you to create a variety of magical effects.

You have 2 Sorcery Points, and you gain more as you reach higher levels, as shown in the Sorcery Points column of the Sorcerer Features table. You can’t have more Sorcery Points than the number shown in the table for your level. You regain all expended Sorcery Points when you finish a Long Rest.

You can use your Sorcery Points to fuel the options below, along with other features, such as Metamagic, that use those points.

Converting Spell Slots to Sorcery Points. You can expend a spell slot to gain a number of Sorcery Points equal to the slot’s level (no action required).

Creating Spell Slots. As a Bonus Action, you can transform unexpended Sorcery Points into one spell slot. The Creating Spell Slots table shows the cost of creating a spell slot of a given level, and it lists the minimum Sorcerer level you must be to create a slot. You can create a spell slot no higher than level 5.

Any spell slot you create with this feature vanishes when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

The Regain Spell Slot activity will convert your Sorcery Points into spell slots.

The Regain Sorcery Points activity will convert your chosen spell slot into Sorcery Points.

Frenzy.name: 狂怒
Frenzy.description:
在你的回合内，当你在狂暴激活时使用鲁莽攻击，你基于力量发起的攻击将对首个命中的目标造成额外伤害。掷等同于你狂暴伤害加值数量的 d6，结果即为造成的额外伤害数值。此额外伤害与你所用武器或徒手打击造成的伤害类型相同。

Foundry Note

伤害行动会随着你等级的提升而自动升级，并且能让你在伤害掷骰的对话框中选择所要使用的伤害类型。之后，它会记住你的选择。

Full of Stars.name: 灿若繁星
Full of Stars.description:
当你处于星耀形态时，你的身体部分无实质化，使你获得钝击、穿刺、与挥砍伤害的抗性。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个主动效果，可自动添加抗性。进入星耀形态时其不会自动应用。您可以通过使用此特性并应用它，或者在角色卡的“效果”选项卡中开启主动效应来激活它。

Gaze of Two Minds.name: 共视感官
Gaze of Two Minds.description:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock

You can use a Bonus Action to touch a willing creature and perceive through its senses until the end of your next turn. As long as the creature is on the same plane of existence as you, you can take a Bonus Action on subsequent turns to maintain this connection, extending the duration until the end of your next turn. The connection ends if you don’t maintain it in this way.

While perceiving through the other creature’s senses, you benefit from any special senses possessed by that creature, and you can cast spells as if you were in your space or the other creature’s space if the two of you are within 60 feet of each other.

Gift of the Depths.name: 深海馈赠
Gift of the Depths.description:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock

You can breathe underwater, and you gain a Swim Speed equal to your Speed.

You can also cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWaterBreat]{Water Breathing} once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast it in this way again when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

The Gift Water Breathing activity consumes a limited use and includes an Active Effect for tracking the chosen creatures.

Gift of the Protectors.name: 守护馈赠
Gift of the Protectors.description:
Prerequisite: Level 9+ Warlock, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvPactTome00]{Pact of the Tome} Invocation

A new page appears in your @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.CwWbeQ6XyqFzbMYw]{Book of Shadows} when you conjure it. With your permission, a creature can take an action to write its name on that page, which can contain a number of names equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one name).

When any creature whose name is on the page is reduced to 0 Hit Points but not killed outright, the creature magically drops to 1 Hit Point instead. Once this magic is triggered, no creature can benefit from it until you finish a Long Rest.

As a Magic action, you can erase a name on the page by touching it.

Foundry Note

The Protect activity consumes a use of its activity which refreshes every Long Rest.

The Write Name activity consumes a use of the item which can be used for tracking how many names you've written down.

The Erase Name activity will restore a use of the item and allows you to add another name.

Protect.name: Protect
Protect.condition: When any creature whose name is on the page is reduced to 0 Hit Points but not killed outright

Gloom Stalker.name: Gloom Stalker
Gloom Stalker.description:
Draw on Shadow Magic to Fight Your Foes

Gloom Stalkers are at home in the darkest places, wielding magic drawn from the Shadowfell to combat enemies that lurk in darkness.

advancement.title: Iron Mind
advancement.hint: You gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws. If you already have this proficiency, you instead gain proficiency in Intelligence or Charisma saving throws (your choice).

Gloom Stalker Spells.name: Gloom Stalker Spells
Gloom Stalker Spells.description:

Glorious Defense.name: Glorious Defense
Glorious Defense.description:
You can turn defense into a sudden strike. When you or another creature you can see within 10 feet of you is hit by an attack roll, you can take a Reaction to grant a bonus to the target’s AC against that attack, potentially causing it to miss. The bonus equals your Charisma modifier (minimum of +1). If the attack misses, you can make one attack with a weapon against the attacker as part of this Reaction if the attacker is within your weapon’s range.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

Glorious Defense.name: Glorious Defense
Glorious Defense.condition: When you or another creature you can see within 10 feet of you is hit by an attack roll

Goading Attack.name: Goading Attack
Goading Attack.description:
When you hit a creature with an attack roll, you can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to goad the target into attacking you. Add the [[/damage @scale.battle-master.superiority.die]]{Superiority Die} to the attack's damage roll. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have Disadvantage on attack rolls against targets other than you until the end of your next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes activities for saving against your Strength or Dexterity. You can use the inline damage roll for the extra damage or the Damage activity.

The Damage activity allows you to select the type of damage it should deal in the roll dialog.

Save Against Strength.name: Save Against Strength
Save Against Strength.condition: When you hit a creature with an attack roll

Save Against Dexterity.name: Save Against Dexterity
Save Against Dexterity.condition: When you hit a creature with an attack roll

Great Old One Patron.name: Great Old One Patron
Great Old One Patron.description:
Unearth Forbidden Lore of Ineffable Beings

When you choose this subclass, you might bind yourself to an unspeakable being from the Far Realm or an elder god—a being such as Tharizdun, the Chained God; Zargon, the Returner; Hadar, the Dark Hunger; or Great Cthulhu. Or you might invoke several entities without yoking yourself to one. The motives of these beings are incomprehensible, and the Great Old One might be indifferent to your existence. But the secrets you’ve learned nevertheless allow you to draw strange magic from it.

advancement.title: Great Old One Spells
advancement.hint: The magic of your patron ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Warlock level specified in the Great Old One Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

advancement.title: Great Old One Spells
advancement.hint: The magic of your patron ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Warlock level specified in the Great Old One Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

advancement.hint: The magic of your patron ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Warlock level specified in the Great Old One Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

advancement.title: Great Old One Spells
advancement.hint: The magic of your patron ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Warlock level specified in the Great Old One Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

advancement.title: Eldritch Hex
advancement.hint: Your alien patron grants you a powerful curse. You always have the Hex spell prepared.

Great Old One Spells.name: Great Old One Spells
Great Old One Spells.description:
The magic of your patron ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Warlock level specified in the Great Old One Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Foundry Note

As you level up these spells will be granted to you automatically.

Greater Divine Intervention.name: 进阶神圣干预
Greater Divine Intervention.description:
你能够呼唤更加强大的神圣干预。当你使用神圣干预特性时，你可以在选择法术时选择 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000] 如果你这样做，你只有在完成 [[/r 2d4]] 次长休后才能再次使用神圣干预。

Foundry Note

此特性会消耗 1 次神圣干预的使用次数，经过一定次数的长休后，其使用次数不会自动恢复。

Greater Portent.name: Greater Portent
Greater Portent.description: The visions in your dreams intensify and paint a more accurate picture in your mind of what is to come. Roll three d20s for your Portent feature rather than two.

Guarded Mind.name: 意念守护
Guarded Mind.description:
You have Resistance to Psychic damage. Moreover, if you start your turn with the Charmed or Frightened condition, you can expend a Psionic Energy Die (no action required) and end every effect on yourself giving you those conditions.

Foundry Note

The Psychic Resistance is granted as you level up.

The End Effects activity can be used to consume a use of your Psionic Energy Die. It does not automatically end the effects though.

Guided Strike.name: 导引打击
Guided Strike.description:
当你或者距离你 30 尺内的一个生物在一次攻击检定中失手时，你可以消耗一次引导神力次数来让这次攻击检定获得+ 10 加值，这可能导致该次攻击命中。当你使用此特性让另一个生物的攻击检定获得此增益时，你必须使用你的反应。

Foundry Note

导引自身行动不会消耗反应。

导引其他生物行动会消耗反应。

Guide Yourself.name: 导引自身
Guide Yourself.condition: 当你攻击检定中失手时

Guide Another Creature.name: 导引其他生物
Guide Another Creature.condition: 距离你 30 尺内的一个生物在一次攻击检定中失手时

Hand of Harm.name: Hand of Harm
Hand of Harm.description: Once per turn when you hit a creature with an Unarmed Strike and deal damage, you can expend 1 Focus Point to deal extra Necrotic damage equal to one roll of your Martial Arts die plus your Wisdom modifier.

damage.condition: Once per turn when you hit a creature with an Unarmed Strike and deal damage

Hand of Healing.name: Hand of Healing
Hand of Healing.description:
As a Magic action, you can expend 1 Focus Point to touch a creature and restore a number of Hit Points equal to a roll of your Martial Arts die plus your Wisdom modifier.

When you use your Flurry of Blows, you can replace one of the Unarmed Strikes with a use of this feature without expending a Focus Point for the healing.

Foundry Note

For the free use when replacing an Unarmed Strike uncheck the Consume Item Use prompt.

Hand of Ultimate Mercy.name: Hand of Ultimate Mercy
Hand of Ultimate Mercy.description:
Your mastery of life energy opens the door to the ultimate mercy. As a Magic action, you can touch the corpse of a creature that died within the past 24 hours and expend 5 Focus Points. The creature then returns to life with a number of Hit Points equal to 4d10 plus your Wisdom modifier. If the creature died with any of the following conditions, the creature revives with the conditions removed: Blinded, Deafened, Paralyzed, Poisoned, and Stunned.

Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

This feature includes a single use per Long Rest and a healing roll.

Healing Light.name: Healing Light
Healing Light.description:
You gain the ability to channel celestial energy to heal wounds. You have a pool of d6s to fuel this healing. The number of dice in the pool equals 1 plus your Warlock level.

As a Bonus Action, you can heal yourself or one creature you can see within 60 feet of yourself, expending dice from the pool. The maximum number of dice you can expend at once equals your Charisma modifier (minimum of one die). Roll the dice you expend, and restore a number of Hit Points equal to the roll’s total. Your pool regains all expended dice when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

The Heal activity allows you to scale the number of dice expended from your pool and is automatically limited to your Charisma modifier.

Heightened Focus.name: Heightened Focus
Heightened Focus.description:
Your Flurry of Blows, Patient Defense, and Step of the Wind gain the following benefits.

Flurry of Blows. You can expend 1 Focus Point to use Flurry of Blows and make three Unarmed Strikes with it instead of two.

Patient Defense. When you expend a Focus Point to use Patient Defense, you gain a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to two rolls of your Martial Arts die.

Step of the Wind. When you expend a Focus Point to use Step of the Wind, you can choose a willing creature within 5 feet of yourself that is Large or smaller. You move the creature with you until the end of your turn. The creature's movement doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks.

Foundry Note

The Flurry of Blows activity will expend 1 Focus Point and you can then make three Unarmed Strikes.

The Patient Defense activity will roll the Temporary Hit Points for you.

Patient Defense.name: Patient Defense
Patient Defense.condition: When you expend a Focus Point to use Patient Defense

Heightened Spell.name: 升阶法术
Heightened Spell.description:
Cost: 2 Sorcery Points

When you cast a spell that forces a creature to make a saving throw, you can spend 2 Sorcery Points to give one target of the spell Disadvantage on saves against the spell.

Heightened Spell.name: Heightened Spell
Heightened Spell.condition: When you cast a spell that forces a creature to make a saving throw

Heroic Warrior.name: 勇战英豪
Heroic Warrior.description: The thrill of battle drives you toward victory. During combat, you can give yourself Heroic Inspiration whenever you start your turn without it.

Holy Nimbus.name: Holy Nimbus
Holy Nimbus.description:
As a Bonus Action, you can imbue your Aura of Protection with holy power, granting the benefits below for 10 minutes or until you end them (no action required). Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a Long Rest. You can also restore your use of it by expending a level 5 spell slot (no action required).

Holy Ward. You have Advantage on any saving throw you are forced to make by a Fiend or an Undead.

Radiant Damage. Whenever an enemy starts its turn in the aura, that creature takes Radiant damage equal to your Charisma modifier plus your Proficiency Bonus.

Sunlight. The aura is filled with Bright Light that is sunlight.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect for tracking your Holy Nimbus but it does not automate the Advantage on Saving Throws.

The Holy Nimbus activity includes a damage roll.

The Regain Use activity will consume a 5th level spell slot and restore a use of this feature.

Hunter.name: Hunter
Hunter.description:
Protect Nature and People from Destruction

You stalk prey in the wilds and elsewhere, using your abilities as a Hunter to protect nature and people everywhere from forces that would destroy them.

Hunter's Lore.name: Hunter's Lore
Hunter's Lore.description: You can call on the forces of nature to reveal certain strengths and weaknesses of your prey. While a creature is marked by your Hunter’s Mark, you know whether that creature has any Immunities, Resistances, or Vulnerabilities, and if the creature has any, you know what they are.

Hunter's Prey.name: Hunter's Prey
Hunter's Prey.description:
You gain one of the following feature options of your choice. Whenever you finish a Short or Long Rest, you can replace the chosen option with the other one.

Colossus Slayer. Your tenacity can wear down even the most resilient foes. When you hit a creature with a weapon, the weapon deals an extra 1d8 damage to the target if it’s missing any of its Hit Points. You can deal this extra damage only once per turn.

Horde Breaker. Once on each of your turns when you make an attack with a weapon, you can make another attack with the same weapon against a different creature that is within 5 feet of the original target, that is within the weapon’s range, and that you haven’t attacked this turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes a Colossus Slayer activity for the additional damage. You can select the correct damage type in the roll dialog.

For the Horde Breaker option simply make another attack.

damage.condition: Once per turn when you hit a creature with a weapon

Hurl Through Hell.name: Hurl Through Hell
Hurl Through Hell.description:
Once per turn when you hit a creature with an attack roll, you can try to instantly transport the target through the Lower Planes. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw against your spell save DC, or the target disappears and hurtles through a nightmare landscape. The target takes 8d10 Psychic damage if it isn’t a Fiend, and it has the &Reference[Incapacitated] condition until the end of your next turn, when it returns to the space it previously occupied or the nearest unoccupied space.

Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a Long Rest unless you expend a Pact Magic spell slot (no action required) to restore your use of it.

Foundry Note

This feature includes one limited use.

The Regain Use activity will expend a Pact Magic spell slot and restore a use of this feature.

Hurl Through Hell.name: Hurl Through Hell
Hurl Through Hell.condition: Once per turn when you hit a creature with an attack roll

Illusion Savant.name: Illusion Savant
Illusion Savant.description:
Choose two Wizard spells from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]{Illusion school} (change the Grouping mode to "School" for easier selection), each of which must be no higher than level 2, and add them to your spellbook for free.

In addition, whenever you gain access to a new level of spell slots in this class, you can add one Wizard spell from the Illusion school to your spellbook for free. The chosen spell must be of a level for which you have spell slots.

Illusionist.name: Illusionist
Illusionist.description:
Weave Subtle Spells of Deception

You specialize in magic that dazzles the senses and tricks the mind, and the illusions you craft make the impossible seem real.

advancement.title: Phantasmal Creatures
advancement.hint: You always have the Summon Beast and Summon Fey spells prepared.

Illusory Reality.name: Illusory Reality
Illusory Reality.description: You have learned to weave shadow magic into your illusions to give them a semi-reality. When you cast an Illusion spell with a spell slot, you can choose one inanimate, nonmagical object that is part of the illusion and make that object real. You can do this on your turn as a Bonus Action while the spell is ongoing. The object remains real for 1 minute, during which it can’t deal damage or give any conditions. For example, you can create an illusion of a bridge over a chasm and then make it real and cross it.

Illusory Self.name: Illusory Self
Illusory Self.description:
When a creature hits you with an attack roll, you can take a Reaction to interpose an illusory duplicate of yourself between the attacker and yourself. The attack automatically misses you, then the illusion dissipates.

Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a Short or Long Rest. You can also restore your use of it by expending a level 2+ spell slot (no action required).

Interpose.name: Interpose
Interpose.condition: When a creature hits you with an attack roll

Implements of Mercy.name: Implements of Mercy
Implements of Mercy.description:
You gain proficiency in the Insight and Medicine skills and proficiency with the Herbalism Kit.

Foundry Note

These proficiencies are granted automatically as you level up.

Improved Blessed Strikes.name: 精通受祝击
Improved Blessed Strikes.description:
你所选择的受祝击变得更加强大。

神圣打击。 神圣打击的额外伤害提升至 2d8。

强力施法。 当你施展一个牧师戏法并对一个生物造成伤害时，你可以为自己或他人带来活力。选择自己或距离你 60 尺内的一个生物，该生物获得等同于你感知调整值 2 倍的临时生命值。

Foundry Note

若选择了神圣打击，其伤害值会自动提升。若选择了强力施法，你就能在该特性上使用强力施法行动。

Potent Spellcasting: Heal.name: 强力施法：治疗
Potent Spellcasting: Heal.condition: 当你施展一个牧师戏法并对一个生物造成伤害时

Improved Brutal Strike.name: 强化凶蛮打击
Improved Brutal Strike.description:
你训练出了更多种残暴的攻击方式。将以下效应加入到你的凶蛮打击选项中：

震撼猛击 Staggering Blow. 目标的下一次豁免检定具有劣势，并且在你的下个回合开始前无法进行借机攻击。

破势猛击 Sundering Blow. 直到你的下个回合开始，另一个生物对目标进行的下一次攻击检定将获得 +5 加值。一次攻击检定只能从一次破势猛击中获得加值。

Foundry Note

该特性为每个选项都设定了一个行动，其中包含一个主动效果，用于跟进震撼和破势猛击，但不会自动执行其效果。

Staggered.name: 震撼
Staggered.description: 你的下一次豁免检定具有劣势，并且在攻击者的下个回合开始前无法进行借机攻击。

Sundered.name: 破势
Sundered.description: 在遭受破势猛击后，另一个生物对你进行的下一次攻击检定将获得 +5 加值。

Improved Brutal Strike (2).name: 强化凶蛮打击(2)
Improved Brutal Strike (2).description:
你的残暴打击造成的额外伤害增加至 2d10。此外，当你使用残暴打击特性时，你可以同时应用两种不同的残暴打击效应。

Foundry Note

在残忍打击中的伤害值会自动调整以使用这个新数值。

Improved Circle Forms.name: 进阶结社形态
Improved Circle Forms.description:
当处于荒野形态时，你获得以下好处：

月耀辉光。你在荒野形态中的每次攻击可以造成正常伤害类型或光耀伤害。每次攻击命中时你都可以选择。

强化韧性。 你可以将你的感知调整值加到你的体质豁免检定结果中。

Foundry Note

这个特性包括一个被动效应，自动对体质豁免检定加值。

Improved Critical.name: 精通重击
Improved Critical.description:
Your attack rolls with weapons and Unarmed Strikes can score a Critical Hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically increases the Critical Hit threshold to 19.

Improved Cunning Strike.name: Improved Cunning Strike
Improved Cunning Strike.description:
You can use up to two Cunning Strike effects when you deal Sneak Attack damage, paying the die cost for each effect.

Foundry Note

After using Cunning Strike effects use the [[/item Cunning Strike activity=Cunning Sneak Attack]]{Cunning Sneak Attack} activity. It will prompt you to select how many dice you expended on effects and deduct them from your Sneak Attack roll automatically.

You can control the damage type in the damage roll dialog box.

Improved Duplicity.name: 精通分身
Improved Duplicity.description:
你召现分身特性所创造的幻象在以下方面变得更加强力。

共享干扰。当你或你的盟友对幻象 5 尺内的敌人进行攻击时，此次攻击具有优势。

治愈幻象。当幻象消失时，你或你选择的 5 尺内的一名生物恢复等同于你牧师等级的生命值。

Foundry Note

该特性包含治愈幻象行动，但其无法自动为幻象范围 5 尺内的生物带来优势。

Improved Elemental Fury.name: 元素神威
Improved Elemental Fury.description:
你选择的元素之怒特性变得愈发强大：

强力施法。 当你施展一个施法距离为10尺及以上的德鲁伊戏法时，法术施法距离提升到 300 尺。

原力蛮击。 原力蛮击的额外伤害提升到 2d8。

Foundry Note

在这个等级，原力蛮击的伤害会自动提升。但此特性不会自动改变其攻击范围。

Improved Illusions.name: Improved Illusions
Improved Illusions.description:
You can cast Illusion spells without providing Verbal components, and if an Illusion spell you cast has a range of 10+ feet, the range increases by 60 feet.

You also know the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]{Minor Illusion} cantrip. If you already know it, you learn a different Wizard cantrip of your choice. The cantrip doesn’t count against your number of cantrips known. You can create both a sound and an image with a single casting of Minor Illusion, and you can cast it as a Bonus Action.

Foundry Note

The Minor Illusion cantrip is added to your sheet as you level up.

Improved Shadow Step.name: Improved Shadow Step
Improved Shadow Step.description:
You can draw on your Shadowfell connection to empower your teleportation. When you use your Shadow Step, you can expend 1 Focus Point to remove the requirement that you must start and end in Dim Light or Darkness for that use of the feature. As part of this Bonus Action, you can make an Unarmed Strike immediately after you teleport.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an activity which will expend a Focus Point.

Improved War Magic.name: 精通战争魔法
Improved War Magic.description: When you take the Attack action on your turn, you can replace two of the attacks with a casting of one of your level 1 or level 2 Wizard spells that has a casting time of an action.

Improved Warding Flare.name: 精通守御之光
Improved Warding Flare.description:
完成一次短休或长休后都将重新恢复所有守御闪光的使用次数。

此外，每当你使用守御闪光时，你可以对被攻击的目标额外提供临时生命值，数目为 2d6 + 你的感知调整值。

Foundry Note

该特性不会自动更新守御之光，使其在短休时恢复。你必须自行编辑物品，并将恢复周期设为短休。

治疗行动包含临时生命值的恢复。

Indomitable.name: 不屈
Indomitable.description:
If you fail a saving throw, you can reroll it with a bonus equal to your Fighter level (currently, [[lookup @classes.fighter.levels]]). You must use the new roll, and you can't use this feature again until you finish a Long Rest.

You can use this feature twice before a Long Rest starting at level 13 and three times before a Long Rest starting at level 17.

Foundry Note

This feature's maximum usages scale automatically as you level up.

Indomitable Might.name: 不屈勇武
Indomitable Might.description: 如果你进行的力量检定或力量豁免检定的总值低于你的力量值，你可以使用你的力量值替代检定总值。

Infiltration Expertise.name: Infiltration Expertise
Infiltration Expertise.description:
You are expert at the following techniques that aid your infiltrations.

Masterful Mimicry. You can unerringly mimic another person’s speech, handwriting, or both if you have spent at least 1 hour studying them.

Roving Aim. Your Speed isn’t reduced to 0 by using Steady Aim.

Innate Sorcery.name: Innate Sorcery
Innate Sorcery.description:
An event in your past left an indelible mark on you, infusing you with simmering magic. As a Bonus Action, you can unleash that magic for 1 minute, during which you gain the following benefits:

  • The spell save DC of your Sorcerer spells increases by 1.
  • You have Advantage on the attack rolls of Sorcerer spells you cast.

You can use this feature twice, and you regain all expended uses of it when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which will increase your spell save DC. The Advantage on attack rolls is not automated.

Innate Sorcery.name: Innate Sorcery
Innate Sorcery.description:
The spell save DC of your Sorcerer spells increases by 1. (Automated)

You have Advantage on the attack rolls of Sorcerer spells you cast. (Not automated)

Inspiring Movement.name: 鼓舞之移
Inspiring Movement.description:
当一个你能看见的敌人在你 5 尺内结束回合时，你可以使用反应来消耗一次吟游诗人激励，移动至多等同于你速度一半的距离（当前 [[lookup @attributes.movement.walk]]）。同时，你可以选择 30 尺内的一名盟友，该盟友也能用反应移动至多等同于其速度一半的距离。

该特性的所有移动均不会引发借机攻击。

Move.name: 移动
Move.condition: 当一个你能看见的敌人在你 5 尺内结束回合时

Inspiring Smite.name: Inspiring Smite
Inspiring Smite.description: Immediately after you cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDivineSmit]{Divine Smite}, you can expend one use of your Channel Divinity and distribute Temporary Hit Points to creatures of your choice within 30 feet of yourself, which can include you. The total number of Temporary Hit Points equals 2d8 plus your Paladin level, divided among the chosen creatures however you like.

heal.condition: Immediately after you cast Divine Smite

Instinctive Pounce.name: 莽驰
Instinctive Pounce.description: 作为你进入狂暴的附赠动作的一部分，你可以移动至多等同于你速度一半的距离。

Intimidating Presence.name: 威慑之姿
Intimidating Presence.description:
以一个附赠动作，你可以用你那令人魂消胆丧的面相，在原初之力的辅助下将恐惧打入他者内心。当你如此做时，每个位于以你为源点的 30 尺光环区域内的你所选择的生物必须进行一次感知豁免（DC等于 8 ＋ 你的力量调整值＋你的熟练加值）。豁免失败的生物陷入恐慌状态，持续 1 分钟。陷入&Reference[Frightened apply=false] 的生物在其的每个回合结束时，可以重新进行该豁免，成功则其身上的恐慌状态提前结束。

一旦你使用了该特性，直到你完成一次长休时，都不能再次使用它。你也可以消耗一次狂暴次数（无需动作）来恢复该特性的使用次数。

Foundry Note

豁免行动包含一种主动效果，该效果会附加恐慌状态。

充能行动会消耗一次狂暴使用次数，并恢复威慑之姿的使用次数。

Investment of the Chain Master.name: 链主赋能
Investment of the Chain Master.description:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvPactChain0]{Pact of the Chain} Invocation

When you cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFindFamili]{Find Familiar}, you infuse the summoned familiar with a measure of your eldritch power, granting the creature the following benefits.

Aerial or Aquatic. The familiar gains either a Fly Speed or a Swim Speed (your choice) of 40 feet.

Quick Attack. As a Bonus Action, you can command the familiar to take the Attack action.

Necrotic or Radiant Damage. Whenever the familiar deals Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage, you can make it deal Necrotic or Radiant damage instead.

Your Save DC. If the familiar forces a creature to make a saving throw, it uses your spell save DC.

Resistance. When the familiar takes damage, you can take a Reaction to grant it Resistance against that damage.

Foundry Note

The Find Familiar with Flight and with Swimming activities both allow you to summon a familiar with the relevant movement bonus. Both activities consume a Pact Magic spell slot.

The Invest with Resistance activity includes an Active Effect for resisting each type of damage which can be applied to get the relevant resistance. Be sure you disable/delete the previous Active Effect in the "Effects" tab of your sheet when you change Resistances.

The familiar automatically uses your Save DC.

Invoke Duplicity.name: 召现分身
Invoke Duplicity.description:
以一个附赠动作，你可以消耗一次引导神力次数，选择距你 30 尺内可见且未被占据的一点，创造出一个与你别无二致的幻象。该幻象实际并无形体也并不占据所在空间。幻象将持续一分钟或直到你陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated] 状态，你也可以提前解消它（无需动作）。幻象将会完全模仿你的表情和姿势。当他存在时，你获得以下增益：

施放法术。你可以如同身处幻象所在的空间一样释放法术，但需要使用自身的感官。

干扰。当你和你的幻象都位于一个可以看见幻象的生物 5 尺范围内，因幻象造成的误导，你在对该生物进行的攻击检定中具有优势。

转移。以一个附赠动作，你可以使幻象移动最多 30 尺至一处你能看见且未被占据的空间，但它必须维持在距离你 120 尺内。

Iron Mind.name: Iron Mind
Iron Mind.description:
You have honed your ability to resist mind-altering powers. You gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws. If you already have this proficiency, you instead gain proficiency in Intelligence or Charisma saving throws (your choice).

Foundry Note

When you gain this feature during advancement you will be prompted to choose your Saving Throw. You should select Wisdom unless you are already proficient in it.

Jack of All Trades.name: 万事通
Jack of All Trades.description:
在你进行属性检定时，如果检定适用一项你缺少的技能熟练项，则你可以将自身熟练加值的一半（向下取整）加入到检定结果中。

例如，当你进行力量（运动）检定但没有运动熟练项时，你仍可以将熟练加值的一半加入检定中。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个被动效应，它会自动为所有未熟练技能提供一半的熟练加值。

Know Your Enemy.name: 料敌机先
Know Your Enemy.description:
以一个附赠动作，你可以分析 30 尺内一个生物的优劣之处。你可以得知该生物所拥有的伤害免疫、伤害抗性或易伤。

每当你使用此特性后，直到你完成一次长休前不能再次使用。你也可以通过消耗一枚卓越骰来重新获得该特性的使用次数（无需动作）。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一项行动，用于识别优势和劣势，还有一项恢复行动，用于恢复该特性的使用次数。

Land's Aid.name: 大地之援
Land's Aid.description:
以一个魔法动作，你可以消耗一次荒野变形使用次数并且选择 60 尺内的一点。给予活力的繁花和吸取生命的荆刺在以那一点为源点的 10 尺半径球状范围同时生出。在该区域内每个你所选择的生物必须进行一次体质豁免，豁免失败时生物受到 2d6 暗蚀伤害，豁免成功时受到 半数伤害。此外，一个区域内你所选择的生物恢复 @scale.land.lands-aid 生命值。

当你达到特定的德鲁伊等级时，伤害和治疗量会提升 1d6 : 10 级（3d6）和 14 级（4d6）。

Foundry Note

此特性包含豁免行动和治疗行动。

治疗/伤害值会随着你的等级提升而自动增加。

Lay on Hands.name: 圣疗
Lay on Hands.description:
你的触碰溢满祝福，可以医治伤口。你获得一个治疗能量池，其内的治疗能量在每次完成长休后自动补满。治疗能量池储备的可恢复生命值总值等于你的圣武士职业等级 × 5。

你可以用一个附赠动作触碰一个生物（可以是你自己），并抽取治疗能量池中的能量恢复该生物的生命值，其恢复量最多等于你的治疗能量池中剩余的治疗量。

此外，你也可以使用来自治疗能量池的 5 点治疗量祛除该生物的中毒状态。不过这些治疗量不会恢复该生物的生命值。

Foundry Note

治疗行动允许你选择需要恢复的生命值点数，并会使你的圣疗池减少相应数值。

移除中毒 行动会使你的圣疗池减少 点，但不会自动移除中毒状态。

Leading Evasion.name: 引导闪避
Leading Evasion.description:
当你受到一个允许你进行敏捷豁免来只承受一半伤害的效应影响时，你在豁免成功时不受伤害，豁免失败时只承受一半伤害。若位于你 5 尺内的其他生物同样需要进行这次敏捷豁免，你可以令他们也享受到此特性的增益。

你无法在 &Reference[Incapacitated] 状态下使用该特性。

Lessons of the First Ones.name: 原初之一的教习
Lessons of the First Ones.description:
先决条件：2 级及以上的魔契师

你从多元宇宙的一位远古存在那里获得了知识，使你可以获得一项自选的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.otAeQs0TLHYIBNuj]（见第 5 章）。

可复选。你可以多次获得此祈唤。每次需选择不同的起源专长。

Life Domain.name: 生命领域
Life Domain.description:
抚慰世界，疗愈伤痛

生命领域专注于帮助维持多元宇宙中所有生命的 正能量。选择这一领域的牧师都是疗愈上的专家，知晓如何使用生命力治愈各种伤痛。

存在本身就依赖于与此领域相关的正能量，因此几乎所有宗教传统的牧师都可能选择此领域。该领域尤其与农业之神、医疗之神或忍耐之神以及家庭和社会之神有关。治那些投身于治愈他人的教团也十分重视这一领域的魔法。

Life Domain Spells.name: 生命领域法术
Life Domain Spells.description:
你与此神圣领域的链接使你总是准备了特定的法术。当你达到生命领域法术表中特定的牧师等级时，你总会将表中对应的法术加入准备。

生命领域法术
牧师等级 准备法术
3

Foundry Note

随着等级提升，这些法术会自动授予。

Lifedrinker.name: 饮命者
Lifedrinker.description:
先决条件 ：9 级及以上的魔契师，具有 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvPactBlade0] 祈唤

每回合一次，当你使用契约武器命中某个生物时，额外造成1d6 黯蚀、心灵或光耀伤害（由你选择），且你可以消耗你的一个生命骰并掷出，恢复总量为掷骰结果加上你体质调整值的生命值（至少为1点生命值）。

Foundry Note

伤害行动可以在掷骰对话框中选择伤害的类型。它会记住你的选择，以便日后使用。

治疗（最大生命骰） 和 治疗（最小生命骰） 两项行动会消耗相应生命骰，并以包含体质调整值的方式进行治疗掷骰。只有在兼职且拥有多种生命骰类型时，你的选择才会产生影响。

damage.condition: 每回合一次，当你使用契约武器命中某个生物时

Heal (Largest Hit Die).name: 治疗（最大生命骰）
Heal (Largest Hit Die).condition: 每回合一次，当你使用契约武器命中某个生物时

Heal (Smallest Hit Die).name: 治疗（最小生命骰）
Heal (Smallest Hit Die).condition: 每回合一次，当你使用契约武器命中某个生物时

Light Domain.name: 光明领域
Light Domain.description:
携光而来，逐尽黑暗

光明领域致力于以神圣的力量带来烈焰与启示。踏入这一领域的牧师，其灵魂被注入了来自神明的光辉与洞察力，他们肩负驱散虚伪与燃烧黑暗的使命。

光明领域与掌管真理，警觉，美丽，洞察与革新的神明相关联。其通常的象征为太阳。某些这类的神会被描绘为太阳本身，或是驾着战车引领太阳划过天际的存在。还有一些则是不懈的哨兵之眼，时刻洞穿每一片阴影与诡计。而其中某些美与才艺的教义还会诠释艺术即灵魂晋升容器的理念。

Light Domain Spells.name: 光明领域法术
Light Domain Spells.description:
光明领域致力于以神圣的力量带来烈焰与启示。踏入这一领域的牧师，其灵魂被注入了来自神明的光辉与洞察力，他们肩负驱散虚伪与燃烧黑暗的使命。

光明领域与掌管真理，警觉，美丽，洞察与革新的神明相关联。其通常的象征为太阳。某些这类的神会被描绘为太阳本身，或是驾着战车引领太阳划过天际的存在。还有一些则是不懈的哨兵之眼，时刻洞穿每一片阴影与诡计。而其中某些美与才艺的教义还会诠释艺术即灵魂晋升容器的理念。

光明领域法术 Light Domain Spells

Foundry Note

随着等级提升，这些法术会自动授予。

Living Legend.name: 现世传说
Living Legend.description:
过往传说能激励你的身心，为你所用，不论那传说是确有其事，还是夸大其词。以一个附赠动作，你获得以下增益，持续 10 分钟，你必须完成一次长休才能再次使用该特性。或者消耗一个 环法术位（无需动作）来重新使用他。

超凡魅力。 一个超凡脱俗的存在赐福于你，你在与魅力相关的全部属性检定上获得优势。

重掷豁免检定。 当你进行一次豁免检定并失败时，你可以用你的反应重骰之。你必须使用重骰之后的结果。

必中打击。 每个你自己的回合一次，当你发动武器攻击但失手，你可以使其改为击中。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个主动效应，可用于追踪，但上述增益未实现自动。

重掷豁免检定 行动仅用于跟进反应的使用情况。

恢复使用次数/strong> 行动可用来耗费一个五环法术位，并恢复此特性的一次使用次数。

Lunar Form.name: 月辉形态
Lunar Form.description:
月之力量充盈着你的身体，让你获得以下增益：

月耀炽光 Improved Lunar Radiance. 一回合一次，你可以对一次荒野形态下的攻击命中的目标额外造成 2d10 光耀伤害。

月辉同行 Shared Moonlight. 当你使用月光飞步时，你还能传送另一个自愿的生物。该生物必须在你的 10 尺内，并且你将它传 送到你出现点的 10 尺内的一个你能看见的未被占据空间中。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一项能造成光耀伤害的行动。

damage.condition: 每回合一次，以荒野形态的攻击命中目标时

Lunging Attack.name: 突刺攻击
Lunging Attack.description:
以一个附赠动作，你可以消耗一枚卓越骰并执行疾走动作。若你在本回合中直线移动至少 5 尺后立即以攻击动作中的一次近战攻击命中，你可以将消耗的卓越骰加在此次攻击的伤害掷骰中。

Foundry Note

伤害行动能让您在掷骰对话框中选择其应造成伤害的类型。

Mage Hand Legerdemain.name: 法师之手 诈术
Mage Hand Legerdemain.description: 你能以一个附赠动作施放法师之手法术，并且你可以使它隐形。你能以一个附赠动作控制法师之手，并且你可以通过法师之手来进行[[/skill slt]] 属性检定。

Magical Ambush.name: 诡术伏击
Magical Ambush.description: 如果你处于 &Reference[Invisible] 状态对某个生物施法，则该生物在本回合里对抗该法术所进行的豁免检定具有劣势。

Magical Cunning.name: 秘法回流
Magical Cunning.description:
你可以举行一道耗时 1 分钟的秘传仪式，并在仪式结束后恢复一半的已消耗的魔契师法术位（向上取整）。一旦你使用此特性，你都不能再这么做，直到你完成了一次长休。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一次免费使用，并将恢复正确的契约魔法法术位数量。

Magical Discoveries.name: 魔法探秘
Magical Discoveries.description:
你学会了两个自选法术。这些法术可以属于 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.LhvuDQEyrCdg5EfU] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz] 也可以分属其中不同的法术列表。不论如何，你所选的法术必须是戏法或者是你已有法术位的法术，如 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbBard000000000.JournalEntryPage.V8pqIWlaL9GhY61t#equipment] 表所示。

所选法术总会在你的准备列表中，并且每当你获得一个吟游诗人等级时，你可以将其中的一个法术替换为另一个符合条件的法术。

Magical Secrets.name: 魔法奥秘
Magical Secrets.description: 你从各种魔法典籍中了解了大量的秘法知识。当你获得吟游诗人等级（包括得到本特性的等级）且“吟游诗人特性”表中准备法术数量上升时，你可以从 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.wwia6Wwo4BgE9GSI]、 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.LhvuDQEyrCdg5EfU] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz] 中选择法术来添加进准备列表。这些法术对你而言都视作吟游诗人法术。此外，当你需要替换准备法术列表时，你也可以从上述各个职业的法术列表中选择。

Maneuvering Attack.name: 灵动攻击
Maneuvering Attack.description: 你以攻击检定 命中一个生物时，可以消耗 1 枚卓越骰以让战友移动到更有利的位置。将所消耗的卓越骰加在此次攻击的伤害掷骰中，并指定一个能看见你或听到你声音的自愿生物。该生物可以用其反应移动至多等于其速度一半的距离。本次移动不会引发本次所攻击目标的借机攻击。

Maneuver.name: 战技
Maneuver.condition: 你以攻击检定命中一个生物时

Manipulate Elements.name: 四象御诀
Manipulate Elements.description:
你已知法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplElementali] 。感知是你的施法属性。

Foundry Note

当你达到该等级时，「四象法门法术将被添加到你的角色卡上，且施法属性为感知。

Mantle of Inspiration.name: 激励光环
Mantle of Inspiration.description: 你用编织入妖精魔法的歌曲或舞蹈来激发他人的活力。以一个附赠动作，你可以消耗一次吟游诗人激励，并掷出你的诗人激励骰。此时，选择你周围 60 尺内的一定数量的其他生物，其数量至多等同于你的魅力调整值（最少 1 个）。每个所选生物都会获得等同于你诗人激励骰结果两倍的临时生命值。而当一个生物获得这些临时生命值时，它可以用其反应移动至多等同于其速度的距离，此次移动不会引发借机攻击。

Mantle of Majesty.name: 威仪作锦
Mantle of Majesty.description:
你始终准备了法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000]{命令术}。

以一个附赠动作，你施展 命令术 且无需消耗法术位，并在 1 分钟内获得超凡的美貌，或直到你的专注结束。在此期间，你可以以一个附赠动作施展 命令术，且无需消耗法术位。

任何被你 &Reference[Charmed] 的生物在对抗你用该特性施展的 命令术 时，其将在豁免检定中自动失败。

一旦使用该特性，直到你完成一次长休前将无法再次使用。你也可以消耗一个 3+ 环的法术位（无需动作）来重获该特性的使用次数。

Foundry Note

“以法术位恢复 Restore with Spell Slot” 行动能赋予此特性额外一次使用次数。

始终准备的法术会自动添加到你的角色卡中。

Martial Arts.name: 武艺
Martial Arts.description:
你的武术训练让你精通使用徒手打击和武僧武器， 包括以下类型：

  • 简易近战武器
  • 具有轻型属性的军用近战武器

当你徒手或仅使用武僧武器，并且未着装护甲或持盾时，你会获得以下增益：

额外徒手打击。你能以附赠动作发动一次徒手打击。

武艺骰。 可以选择用 d6 骰代替原本的伤害掷骰。该骰子将随武僧职业等级的提升而增大，具体数据见武僧特性表中“武艺”一栏。

敏捷攻击。 可以用敏捷值代替力量值进行攻击检定和伤害掷骰。此外，当你使用徒手打击来进行推撞或擒抱时，你也可以用敏捷调整值代替力量调整值来计算豁免难度。

Martial Training.name: 战争训练
Martial Training.description:
你获得军用武器的熟练，且获得中甲和盾牌的护甲训练。

此外，你可以使用简易或军用武器作为施法法器，以此施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.wwia6Wwo4BgE9GSI]中的法术

Foundry Note

在角色升级时，你将自动获得使用军用武器的熟练和中型护甲和盾牌的受训。

Mask of Many Faces.name: 千面之脸
Mask of Many Faces.description:
先决条件：2 级及以上的魔契师

你可以随意施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]，且无需消耗法术位。

Foundry Note

施法行动可以用伪装术代替，并且包含一个主动效应，用于跟进易容状态。

Disguised.name: 易容
Disguised.description: 如果一名生物想要分辨你是否易容，则必须使用一个研究动作研究你的外貌，并成功于一次对抗你法术豁免DC的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] 检定。

Master of Myriad Forms.name: 万形之主
Master of Myriad Forms.description:
先决条件：5 级及以上的魔契师

你可以随意施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAlterSelf0]，且无需消耗法术位。

Foundry Note

此特性包含“变身术”的行动。

水生适应和改变样貌 以及 天生武器 这些行动包含有主动效应，用于跟进你的选择，并且需要专注。

当你选择天生武器选项时，攻击行动可用于你的攻击/伤害掷骰。

Aquatic Adaptation.name: 水生适应
Aquatic Adaptation.description: 你可以在水下呼吸，并且获得等同于步行速度的游泳速度。

Natural Weapon.name: 天生武器
Natural Weapon.description: 当你使用徒手打击以这些新长的器官造成伤害时，它会造成 1d6 对应类型伤害，而非你通常的徒手打击伤害，并且你使用你的施法关键属性调整值而非力量调整值来作为攻击和伤害的调整值。

Memorize Spell.name: 记忆法术
Memorize Spell.description: 每当你完成一次短休时，你可以研究你的法术书并且将其中一道你以 施法 特性准备的一环及以上的法术替换为你法术书中的另一道一环及以上的法术。

Menacing Attack.name: 恐吓攻击
Menacing Attack.description:
你以攻击检定命中一个生物时，可消耗一枚卓越骰以尝试恐吓该目标。所消耗的卓越骰还会被加到此次攻击的伤害掷骰中。目标必须通过一次感知豁免，豁免失败则陷入恐慌状态，直到你下个回合结束为止。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个力量对抗豁免行动和一个敏捷对抗豁免行动，二者均会消耗 1 次你的卓越骰使用次数。

伤害行动允许你在掷骰对话框中选择此次攻击应造成的伤害类型。

Save Against Strength.name: 力量对抗豁免
Save Against Strength.condition: 你以攻击检定命中一个生物时

Save Against Dexterity.name: 敏捷对抗豁免
Save Against Dexterity.condition: 你以攻击检定命中一个生物时

Metamagic.name: 超魔法
Metamagic.description:
由于你的魔法直接从你体内流向外界，你可以修改你的法术来适应自己的需要。你从超魔法选项中选择并获得 2 个你所选的超魔法选项。你使用你所选的超魔法来临时改变你施展的法术。你必须消耗等同于其描述中需求的术法点以使用一个超魔法选项。

当你施展一道法术时，你只能在其上应用一次超魔法选项，除非超魔法选项中另有说明。

每当你获得一级术士等级时，你可以将一个超魔法选项更改为另一个超魔法选项。当你达到10级和17级术士等级时，你可以分别再获得2个超魔法选项。

Foundry Note

随着等级的提升，系统会提示你选择超魔法选项。

Mindless Rage.name: 无我狂暴
Mindless Rage.description:
你在狂暴激活时对 &Reference[Charmed] 和 &Reference[Frightened] 状态免疫。如果你狂暴时正处于魅惑或恐慌，则这些状态立刻终止。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一种主动效果，能让你对魅惑和恐慌免疫。但当你开始狂暴时，它并不会自动生效。

Misty Escape.name: 雾遁
Misty Escape.description:
当你受到伤害时，你可以用反应施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]。

此外，你的妖精步伐获得以下选项。

迷踪步伐。你获得 &Reference[Invisible] ，持续直到你的下一回合开始或当你发动一次攻击检定、造成伤害、或是施展一道法术之后。

惊惧步伐。 位于你传送前或传送后的空间（由你选择）5尺内的生物必须进行一次对抗你法术豁免DC的感知豁免，豁免失败则受到2d10心灵伤害。

Foundry Note

迷踪步伐行动包含一种主动效应，可施加“隐形”状态。

当你升级时，这个法术会自动授予你。

Misty Visions.name: 幻象迷踪
Misty Visions.description:
先决条件：2 级及以上的魔契师

你可以随意施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSilentImag]，且无需消耗法术位。

Foundry Note

此特性包含 无声幻影 行动，可替代其使用。

Misty Wanderer.name: 雾行漫游
Misty Wanderer.description:
你可以免费施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]而不需要消耗法术位，次数等同于你的感知调整值次（至少一次），在完成一次长休后，你重获所有的已消耗的次数。

另外，每当你施展 迷踪步 时，你可以携带一个 5 尺以内你可见的自愿生物与你一同传送。那个生物会被传送到由你选择的，位于你的目标位置周围 5 尺范围内的一处未被占据的空间内。

Foundry Note

此特可用于跟进你的有限使用次数。你可以正常施放法术，并取消勾选“消耗”选项框。

Monk.name: 武僧
Monk.description:
超凡脱俗，武定乾坤

武僧核心特质

关键属性

敏捷与感知

生命骰

每武僧等级 D8

豁免熟练

力量与敏捷

技能熟练

从体操、运动、历史、洞察、宗教或隐匿中选择两项

武器熟练

简易武器和具有轻型属性的军用武器

工具熟练

选择一种工匠工具或乐器

护甲受训

无

起始装备

选择 A 或 B：（A）短矛、 5 把匕首、所选择的工匠工具或乐器、探索套组和 11GP；（B）50 GP

靠着严苛的战斗训练和精神修炼，武僧与多元宇宙调谐并知晓如何集中内在的力量。不同的武僧对这股力量有着不同的解读，比如说呼吸、能量、生命力、精华或自相。这股力量在武僧的手中，有时化作迅猛狂暴的武技，有时化作精巧快速的防御与速度。
武僧专注于自己体内的力量来创造各种非凡之事，甚至可以说超脱自然。不论是否手持武器，他们的攻击在如此技艺下兼具惊人的速度与力量。在武僧手中，即使是最基本的武器也能化为神兵利器。

许多武僧认为受持戒律的生活有助于维持身心专注，以此更好驾驭自身的力量。也有其他僧侣认为，沉浸在纷乱的世俗生活中才有助于增强他们的决心和纪律。
武僧通常将冒险视为对身体和精神成长的考验。他们的驱动力不仅仅是战胜怪物和寻获财宝，更是希望将自己磨练成钢筋铁骨。

成为武僧...

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得“武僧核心特质”表中的所有特质。
  • 获得“武僧特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得“武僧核心特质”表中的生命骰。
  • 获得“武僧特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。.

Monk's Focus.name: 武僧武功
Monk's Focus.description:
通过运转玄功和习练武艺，你便得以掌握自身非凡的内在能量。功力点代表着你所能使用的这份能量。你的武僧等级决定了你拥有多少功力点，具体数据见武僧特性表中的功力点一列。

你可以消耗功力点来增强或启动特定的武僧特性。你一开始掌握三种特性：疾风连击，坚强防御，疾步如风。细节见下。

每当你消耗 1 点功力时，直到你完成一次短休或者长休前其将暂时不可以再被使用。在完成休息时，你将回复所有已消耗的功力点。

你的某些特性会要求你的目标进行豁免以对抗该特性的效果，这些特性的豁免DC为 8 + 你的感知调整值 + 你的熟练加值。

疾风连击。 你可以消耗 1 点功力，以一个附赠动作发动两次徒手打击。

闪转腾挪。 你能以一个附赠动作执行撤离动作。此外，你可以消耗 1 点功力，以一个附赠动作同时执行撤离与回避动作。

疾步如风。 你能以一个附赠动作执行疾走动作。此外，你可以消耗 1 点功力，以一个附赠动作同时执行撤离与疾走 动作，同时使你该回合内的跳跃距离翻倍。

Foundry Note

疾风连击行动属于附赠动作，会消耗 1 点功力，其中包括一次以武艺骰进行的徒手打击的攻击检定和伤害，随着等级提升，其伤害会自动增加。

闪转腾挪行动包含一个主动效果，用于跟进撤离动作。“闪转腾挪（功力）Patient Defense (Focus Point)” 行动会消耗 1 点功力，并包含一个主动效应，可添加回避状态。

疾步如风 行动会消耗 1 点功力，并包含一个主动效果，用于跟进撤离动作。

Moonlight Step.name: 月光飞步
Moonlight Step.description:
你魔法性地传送自己，在闪耀的月光之中重新出现。以一个附赠动作，你传送到 30 尺内一处你可见且未被占据的空间，并且直到该回合结束前，你的下一次攻击检定带有优势。

你可以使用此能力的次数等同于你的感知调整值（最少 1 次），长休后回复所有使用次数。你也可以消耗一个二环或以上的法术位来回复一次使用次数（无须动作）。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一项行动，其附带的被动效应用于跟进你何时拥有优势，但优势未自动化。

以法术位充能行动可用于将法术位转换为该特性的使用次数。您可以通过提升等级来选择更高级别的法术位。

Mystic Arcanum.name: 玄奥秘法
Mystic Arcanum.description:
你的宗主赐予了你一项被称为秘法的魔法奥秘。从契术师法术列表中选择一个 6 环法术作为该秘法。

你可以在不消耗法术位的情况下施展一次该秘法，如此之后在完成一次长休前你都不能再次以此施展它。

如契术师特性表所示，在更高的契术师等级，你将获得更多可以通过此法施展的契术师法术：13 级时候获得一个 7 环秘法，15 级时获得一个 8 环秘法，17 级时获得一个 9 环秘法。你在完成一次长休后将恢复所有玄奥秘法的使用次数。

每当你获得契术师等级时，你都可以将一个秘法替换为契术师法术列表中，同环位的另一个法术。

Natural Recovery.name: 自然恢复
Natural Recovery.description:
你可以施展一个你以结社法术特性准备的一环及以上法术，而无须消耗法术位，并且你必须在结束一次长休后才能再次这么做。

此外，当你结束一次短休后，你可以选择恢复消耗的法术位。法术环阶的总和等于你德鲁伊职业等级的一半（向上取整），且不能是六环或更高环阶的法术位。比如说，作为一位 6 级德鲁伊，你可以恢复环阶总和最多为 3 的法术位。你可以恢复一个三环法术位，或者一个二环和一个一环法术位，或者 3 个一环法术位。一旦你以此特性恢复过法术位，直到结束一次长休以前你无法再次这么做。

Foundry Note

施法 行动可用于跟进其单次免费使用。

恢复法术位行动并不能自动恢复法术位，但可用于跟进其自身的一次性使用。

Nature Speaker.name: 自然语者
Nature Speaker.description:
你可以施展法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommunewit]{问道自然} 但只能以仪式的方式来施展。感知是你施展这些法术的施法属性。

Foundry Note

该法术仅作为仪式法术授予你，并且已设定以感知值作为施法调整值。

Nature's Sanctuary.name: 自然庇护
Nature's Sanctuary.description:
以一个魔法动作，你可以消耗一次荒野形态次数，在距离你 120 尺内的一处 15 尺立方体内召唤出灵体树木和藤蔓。将持续存在 1 分钟或直到你陷入失能或死亡。你和你的盟友在该区域内视为半身掩护，且位于区域内的盟友会获得你自然守御特性所提供的伤害抗性。

你可以用一个附赠动作，将立方体移动至多 60 尺，但必须距你 120 尺内。

Foundry Note

该特性涵盖了每种“自然守御”地形类型的主动效果，并添加了半身掩护状态效应，该效应会自动授予相关加值。将相关效应施加于您的盟友身上。

但指定区域内的角色的主动效应并不会自动被添加/移除。

该特性包含一项行动，可用于跟进你在移动灵体树木和藤蔓时附赠动作的使用情况。

Nature's Veil.name: 自然面纱
Nature's Veil.description:
你可以暂时地使用自然的力量将你的身形遮蔽。以一个附赠动作，你可以魔法地使自己变得隐形，直到你的下个回合开始。

你可以使用该特性的次数同等于你的感知调整值（至少为 1），完成一次长休后，你重获全部已消耗的使用次数。

Foundry Note

该特性包含施加隐形状态的主动效应。

Nature's Ward.name: 自然守御
Nature's Ward.description:
你免疫中毒状态，并且你具有和你目前在结社法术特性中选择的土地相关的伤害类型的抗性，如自然守御表格所示。

自然守御 Nature's Ward
地形 Land Type 抗性 Resistance
荒漠 火焰
极地 寒冷
温带 光耀
热带 毒素

Foundry Note

该特性包含毒素免疫的被动效应，以及针对每种地形类型的主动效应。您能够激活您所选地形类型的主动效应。

Nature's Wrath.name: 自然之怒
Nature's Wrath.description:
>你可以消耗一次引导神力特性唤起原初之力来诱捕敌人。以一个魔法动作，你可以让特殊的藤蔓生长并缠绕一个距离你 15 尺内，你能看见的生物。该生物必须进行一次力量或敏捷豁免（由其选择），豁免失败者将陷入束缚状态，藤曼持续存在一分钟。此后，每当该生物结束其回合时，都可以再进行一次该豁免。一旦豁免成功，则该生物挣脱束缚，藤蔓也就此消失。

Foundry Note

该特性包含施加束缚状态的主动效应。

Oath of Devotion.name: 奉献之誓
Oath of Devotion.description:
当仁不让知行正。

圣武士立下奉献之誓，只为维护正义和秩序。他们是身披闪亮的盔甲的正派骑士形象代表，躬行着公正的教条，追寻崇高的目标。
追随该誓言的许多圣武士都献身于守序和善良的神，并将其的信条视作奉献的标准。他们将善良阵营的完美侍从天使视作其典范，并在头盔或盾徽上饰以天使羽翼的形象。
立下此誓言的圣武士都赞成以下信条：

  • 实事求是，言出必行。
  • 锄强扶弱，临危不惧。
  • 荣誉为典，以身作则。

Oath of Devotion Spells.name: 奉献之誓法术
Oath of Devotion Spells.description:
当你达到奉献之誓法术表中所示的圣武士等级时， 你将同时获得其对应的圣誓法术。圣誓法术一旦获得，将会一直在你的准备法术列表中。

圣武士等级 法术

随着你的等级提升，这些法术将会自动授予你。

Oath of Glory.name: 荣耀之誓
Oath of Glory.description:
砥身励行蜚声英

对荣耀宣誓的圣武士坚信他们将与同伴一起达成英勇的伟业，并命中注定以此取得荣耀。他们将刻苦训练，砥砺前行，从而确保当命运决定的时刻到来之际，他们都已有所准备。
立下此誓言的圣武士都赞成以下信条：

  • 力争上游，行胜于言。
  • 无惧挑战，勇往直前。
  • 振奋人心，力争荣耀。

Oath of Glory Spells.name: 荣耀之誓法术
Oath of Glory Spells.description:
当你达到荣耀之誓法术表中所示的圣武士等级时， 你将同时获得其对应的圣誓法术。圣誓法术一旦获得，将会一直在你的准备法术列表中。

荣耀之誓法术
圣武士等级 法术

Foundry Note

随着你的等级提升，这些法术将会自动授予你。

Oath of Vengeance.name: 复仇之誓
Oath of Vengeance.description:
铁面无情伏妖魔

复仇之誓，是立誓惩戒那些严重罪行的庄严承诺。当邪恶势力屠杀无助居民，当暴君背离神的意志，当某个盗贼行会过于强横霸道，当恐怖巨龙横行乡野——每当这种时刻，复仇之誓的圣武士就会出现来拨乱反正。
立下此誓言的圣武士都赞成以下信条：

  • 对恶徒，绝无怜悯。
  • 抗不义，追究到底。
  • 遇不平，拔刀相助。

Oath of Vengeance Spells.name: 复仇之誓法术
Oath of Vengeance Spells.description:
当你达到复仇之誓法术表中所示的圣武士等级时，你将同时获得其对应的圣誓法术。圣誓法术一旦获得，将会一直在你的准备法术列表中。

复仇之誓
圣武士等级 法术
